connector.description: Manage workflows in the AWS Simple Workflow service.

camel.sink.endpoint.amazonSWClient.name: camel.sink.endpoint.amazonSWClient
camel.sink.endpoint.amazonSWClient.description: To use the given AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient as client

camel.sink.endpoint.dataConverter.name: camel.sink.endpoint.dataConverter
camel.sink.endpoint.dataConverter.description: An instance of com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.DataConverter to use for serializing/deserializing the data.

camel.sink.endpoint.eventName.name: camel.sink.endpoint.eventName
camel.sink.endpoint.eventName.description: The workflow or activity event name to use.

camel.sink.endpoint.region.name: camel.sink.endpoint.region
camel.sink.endpoint.region.description: Amazon AWS Region. When using this parameter, the configuration will expect the capitalized name of the region (for example AP_EAST_1) You'll need to use the name Regions.EU_WEST_1.name()

camel.sink.endpoint.version.name: camel.sink.endpoint.version
camel.sink.endpoint.version.description: The workflow or activity event version to use.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.clientConfigurationP.name: camel.sink.endpoint.clientConfigurationParameters
camel.sink.endpoint.clientConfigurationP.description: To configure the ClientConfiguration using the key/values from the Map.

camel.sink.endpoint.startWorkflowOptions.name: camel.sink.endpoint.startWorkflowOptionsParameters
camel.sink.endpoint.startWorkflowOptions.description: To configure the StartWorkflowOptions using the key/values from the Map.

camel.sink.endpoint.sWClientParameters.name: camel.sink.endpoint.sWClientParameters
camel.sink.endpoint.sWClientParameters.description: To configure the AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient using the key/values from the Map.

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.sink.endpoint.childPolicy.name: camel.sink.endpoint.childPolicy
camel.sink.endpoint.childPolicy.description: The policy to use on child workflows when terminating a workflow.

camel.sink.endpoint.executionStartToClos.name: camel.sink.endpoint.executionStartToCloseTimeout
camel.sink.endpoint.executionStartToClos.description: Set the execution start to close timeout.

camel.sink.endpoint.signalName.name: camel.sink.endpoint.signalName
camel.sink.endpoint.signalName.description: The name of the signal to send to the workflow.

camel.sink.endpoint.stateResultType.name: camel.sink.endpoint.stateResultType
camel.sink.endpoint.stateResultType.description: The type of the result when a workflow state is queried.

camel.sink.endpoint.taskStartToCloseTime.name: camel.sink.endpoint.taskStartToCloseTimeout
camel.sink.endpoint.taskStartToCloseTime.description: Set the task start to close timeout.

camel.sink.endpoint.terminationReason.name: camel.sink.endpoint.terminationReason
camel.sink.endpoint.terminationReason.description: The reason for terminating a workflow.

camel.component.aws-swf.amazonSWClient.name: camel.component.aws-swf.amazonSWClient
camel.component.aws-swf.amazonSWClient.description: To use the given AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient as client

camel.component.aws-swf.dataConverter.name: camel.component.aws-swf.dataConverter
camel.component.aws-swf.dataConverter.description: An instance of com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.DataConverter to use for serializing/deserializing the data.

camel.component.aws-swf.eventName.name: camel.component.aws-swf.eventName
camel.component.aws-swf.eventName.description: The workflow or activity event name to use.

camel.component.aws-swf.region.name: camel.component.aws-swf.region
camel.component.aws-swf.region.description: Amazon AWS Region. When using this parameter, the configuration will expect the capitalized name of the region (for example AP_EAST_1) You'll need to use the name Regions.EU_WEST_1.name()

camel.component.aws-swf.version.name: camel.component.aws-swf.version
camel.component.aws-swf.version.description: The workflow or activity event version to use.

camel.component.aws-swf.lazyStartProduce.name: camel.component.aws-swf.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.aws-swf.lazyStartProduce.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.aws-swf.autowiredEnabled.name: camel.component.aws-swf.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.aws-swf.autowiredEnabled.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.aws-swf.clientConfigurat.name: camel.component.aws-swf.clientConfigurationParameters
camel.component.aws-swf.clientConfigurat.description: To configure the ClientConfiguration using the key/values from the Map.

camel.component.aws-swf.startWorkflowOpt.name: camel.component.aws-swf.startWorkflowOptionsParameters
camel.component.aws-swf.startWorkflowOpt.description: To configure the StartWorkflowOptions using the key/values from the Map.

camel.component.aws-swf.sWClientParamete.name: camel.component.aws-swf.sWClientParameters
camel.component.aws-swf.sWClientParamete.description: To configure the AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient using the key/values from the Map.

camel.component.aws-swf.childPolicy.name: camel.component.aws-swf.childPolicy
camel.component.aws-swf.childPolicy.description: The policy to use on child workflows when terminating a workflow.

camel.component.aws-swf.executionStartTo.name: camel.component.aws-swf.executionStartToCloseTimeout
camel.component.aws-swf.executionStartTo.description: Set the execution start to close timeout.

camel.component.aws-swf.signalName.name: camel.component.aws-swf.signalName
camel.component.aws-swf.signalName.description: The name of the signal to send to the workflow.

camel.component.aws-swf.stateResultType.name: camel.component.aws-swf.stateResultType
camel.component.aws-swf.stateResultType.description: The type of the result when a workflow state is queried.

camel.component.aws-swf.taskStartToClose.name: camel.component.aws-swf.taskStartToCloseTimeout
camel.component.aws-swf.taskStartToClose.description: Set the task start to close timeout.

camel.component.aws-swf.terminationReaso.name: camel.component.aws-swf.terminationReason
camel.component.aws-swf.terminationReaso.description: The reason for terminating a workflow.
